thread.title: DaviesL
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by DaviesL

author: DaviesL
title: DaviesL
text: Bought children's wellingtons that were too small for my boy, sent back free of charge, and a very prompt email arrived to let me know that the order for a bigger size up had been processed. Extremely pleased. Will buy again and recommed to others
